name: Yudz Api'S
description: Simple and easy to use API documentation.

items.name: Check Apikey
items.desc: cek masa aktif api dan limit

items.name: Status Server
items.desc: Informasi Detail Server

items.name: TeraBox Downloader
items.desc: Download file atau folder dari TeraBox/1024TeraBox menggunakan URL share publik. Mendukung pengambilan informasi file, folder, dan tautan unduhan langsung.

items.name: Twitter Downloader
items.desc: Download media dari postingan Twitter/X (video, gambar, atau GIF) hanya dengan URL postingan

items.name: Threads Downloader
items.desc: Download postingan Threads (teks, gambar, atau video) hanya dengan URL postingan

items.name: GitHub Downloader
items.desc: Download file atau folder tertentu dari GitHub, berdasarkan username dan nama repo

params.url: Masukkan URL GitHub (contoh: https://github.com/username/repo, atau https://github.com/username/repo/blob/main/file.js, atau https://github.com/username/repo/tree/main/folder)

items.name: Spotifyv2 Download
items.desc: Download lagu dari Spotify via API

items.name: GDRIVE Download
items.desc: Download google drive from api

params.url: Masukkan URL google drive wajib file jngn folder

items.name: AN1 Download
items.desc: Download any APK mod via API

params.url: Masukkan URL APK mod dari android1 detail yang ingin di-download

items.name: Videy Downloader
items.desc: Download any video from Videy via API

items.name: Facebook Downloader
items.desc: Download any video facebook via API

items.name: Capcut Downloader
items.desc: Download any video Capcut via API

items.name: Tiktok Downloader
items.desc: Download any video/image/audio tiktok via API

params.url: input parameter url from tiktok search

items.name: Soundcloud Downloader
items.desc: Download any audio soundcloud via API

params.url: input parameter url from soundcloud search

items.name: Pinterest Downloader
items.desc: Download any image/video pin via API

params.url: input parameter url from pinterest search

items.name: Pinterest Downloader V2
items.desc: Download any image/video pin via API

params.url: input parameter url from pinterest search

items.name: Aptoide Downloader
items.desc: Download any Apk via API

params.id: input parameter id from  aptoide search

items.name: Xnxx Downloader
items.desc: Download any Xnxx video via API

params.url: input parameter link from  xnxx search

items.name: Spotify Downloader
items.desc: Download any Spotify track via API

items.name: Telegram Sticker
items.desc: Download any Sticker tele via API

items.name: YouTube Downloader
items.desc: Download any YouTube video via API

items.name: YouTube Downloader V3
items.desc: Download video atau audio dari YouTube dengan format dan kualitas yang dapat disesuaikan.

params.apikey: Masukkan API key kamu untuk otentikasi

items.name: YouTube Downloader V2
items.desc: Download any YouTube video via API

items.name: ApkPure Search
items.desc: Cari aplikasi di ApkPure berdasarkan kata kunci

params.q: kata kunci pencarian aplikasi (contoh: mobile legends)

items.name: ApkPure Detail
items.desc: Ambil detail informasi aplikasi dari halaman ApkPure

items.name: ApkPure DetailAPK
items.desc: Ambil detail file APK dari halaman ApkPure (termasuk versi, ukuran, tanggal rilis)

items.name: ApkPure Download
items.desc: Ambil tautan langsung untuk mengunduh APK dari ApkPure

items.name: AnimeIndo Search
items.desc: Search anime on AnimeIndo by keyword

items.name: AnimeIndo Home
items.desc: Get anime list from AnimeIndo home (with pagination)

items.name: AnimeIndo Detail
items.desc: Get detail info of an anime from AnimeIndo

items.name: AnimeIndo Genre
items.desc: Get anime list by genre from AnimeIndo

params.type: nama genre anime (misalnya: action, comedy, romance)

items.name: AnimeIndo Stream
items.desc: Get video streaming link from AnimeIndo

items.name: Lirik Lagu
items.desc: Search for song lyrics by text query

params.q: Masukkan judul atau potongan lirik lagu

items.name: Brave Search
items.desc: Search results from Brave by text query

items.name: Resep Masakan
items.desc: Search for Indonesian recipes by text query

params.q: Masukkan nama resep yang ingin dicari

items.name: Genshin Character
items.desc: Search for Genshin character by text query

params.q: Masukkan karakter Genshin yang ingin dicari

items.name: Noveltoon Search
items.desc: Search for novels on Noveltoon by text query

params.q: Masukkan judul novel yang ingin dicari

items.name: Noveltoon Detail
items.desc: Fetch detailed info for a novel from Noveltoon using URL

params.url: Masukkan URL noveltoon untuk fetch detail

items.name: NPM Package Search
items.desc: Search for NPM packages and get details like downloads, description, and latest version

params.q: Masukkan nama paket NPM yang ingin dicari

items.name: GSM Arena Search
items.desc: Get phone specifications from GSM Arena

params.q: Masukkan nama HP yang ingin dicari

items.name: Otakudesu Ongoing
items.desc: Get list of ongoing anime from Otakudesu

params.ongoing: Set true untuk mendapatkan daftar anime ongoing

items.name: Otakudesu Search
items.desc: Search anime on Otakudesu by title

params.q: Judul anime yang dicari (misal: One Piece, Naruto, Bleach)

items.name: Otakudesu Detail
items.desc: Get detail info of an anime from Otakudesu

params.url: URL penuh atau path anime di Otakudesu (misal: /anime/one-piece-sub-indo/)

items.name: Otakudesu Download
items.desc: Get download links of an anime episode from Otakudesu

params.url: URL penuh atau path episode di Otakudesu (misal: /episode/one-piece-ep-1000-sub-indo/)
params.download: Set true untuk mengambil link download

items.name: Ringtone Search
items.desc: Search ringtones on Meloboom by title

params.q: Judul ringtone yang dicari (misal: iphone, anime, pop)

items.name: Wikimedia Search
items.desc: Search articles or media from Wikimedia

params.q: Judul artikel atau kata kunci yang dicari (misal: Albert Einstein, Indonesia, Anime)

items.name: Wallpaper Search
items.desc: Search wallpapers on BestHDWallpaper by title

params.q: Judul wallpaper yang dicari (misal: Naruto, landscape, anime)

items.name: Wattpad Search
items.desc: Search stories on Wattpad by query

items.name: Wattpad Detail / List
items.desc: Get list of chapters or story details from Wattpad by URL

params.url: Full URL or path of the story (e.g., /story/123456)

items.name: Wattpad Read Chapter
items.desc: Read full content of a Wattpad story chapter by URL

params.url: Full URL or path of the story (e.g., /story/123456)
params.chapter: Set to true to read chapter content

items.name: Livechart Search
items.desc: Search anime on Livechart by query

items.name: Livechart Detail
items.desc: Get detailed info of an anime from Livechart

params.url: Full URL or path of the anime (e.g., /anime/naruto)

items.desc: Search comics on Komikindo by keyword

items.name: LK21 Detail
items.desc: Get detailed info of a movie/episode from LK21

items.desc: Search movies/series on LK21 by keyword

items.name: Samehadaku Home
items.desc: Menampilkan daftar anime terbaru dari halaman utama Samehadaku.

items.name: Samehadaku Latest
items.desc: Menampilkan anime rilis terbaru (update episode).

items.name: Samehadaku Search
items.desc: Cari anime di Samehadaku berdasarkan kata kunci.

params.q: Kata kunci pencarian (contoh: one piece, naruto)

items.name: Samehadaku Ongoing
items.desc: Menampilkan daftar anime yang sedang tayang (ongoing).

items.name: Samehadaku Completed
items.desc: Menampilkan daftar anime yang sudah selesai (completed).

items.name: Samehadaku Batch List
items.desc: Menampilkan daftar anime batch (paketan episode).

items.name: Samehadaku Batch Detail
items.desc: Menampilkan detail batch anime lengkap dengan link download.

items.name: Samehadaku Detail
items.desc: Menampilkan detail lengkap suatu anime (sinopsis, episode, genre, dsb).

items.name: Samehadaku Episode Detail
items.desc: Menampilkan detail episode tertentu, termasuk link server nonton.

items.name: Samehadaku Stream
items.desc: Mendapatkan link embed streaming dari server tertentu.

items.name: Kodepos Finder
items.desc: Mencari informasi kodepos berdasarkan nama daerah atau kodepos menggunakan layanan resmi Pos Indonesia.

params.q: Nama daerah atau kodepos yang ingin dicari (contoh: jakarta selatan atau 10210)

items.name: Subdomain Finder
items.desc: Menemukan subdomain aktif dari sebuah domain utama menggunakan metode pemindaian DNS publik.

params.host: Nama domain utama yang ingin dicari subdomainnya (contoh: example.com)

items.name: Cek Kouta
items.desc: Cek informasi kuota atau paket data dari nomor ponsel tertentu ( XL, Axis ).

params.number: Nomor ponsel yang ingin dicek kuotanya (contoh: 08xxx/628xx)

items.name: Weather
items.desc: Ambil data cuaca terkini berdasarkan nama propinsi dari api

params.q: Nama propinsi yang ingin dicek cuacanya (contoh: Kepulauan Riau, Jakarta, Surabaya)

items.name: Pxpic Editor
items.desc: Gunakan AI PxPic untuk mengedit gambar (removebg, enhance, upscale, restore, colorize)

params.url: URL gambar yang ingin diproses (contoh: https://i.imgur.com/abcd.jpg)
params.tools: Pilih tools: removebg, enhance, upscale, restore, colorize

items.name: Style Text
items.desc: Convert teks menjadi berbagai gaya unik

params.q: Teks yang ingin diubah gayanya (contoh: Yudzxml)

items.name: Image Edit
items.desc: Edit an image via AI by providing URL and prompt

items.name: Screenshot Website
items.desc: Take a screenshot of a website

items.name: Generate Quote
items.desc: Generate a quote image with text, name, avatar, and color

items.name: 2FA Token
items.desc: Generate a 2FA token for a given key

items.name: Speech to Text
items.desc: Convert audio from URL to text

items.name: Text To Speech
items.desc: Convert text into speech audio

items.name: Check Host
items.desc: Check a host/domain via ping, http, or other methods

params.type: tipe check: ping, http, dll (default ping)

items.name: TTP
items.desc: Generate a transparent text image by providing text. You must provide 'text'.

params.text: Teks yang akan dijadikan gambar transparan (wajib diisi)

items.name: Smeme
items.desc: Generate a smeme image by providing profile picture and text(s). You must provide at least one of 'text' or 'text2'.

params.pp: URL profile picture yang akan digunakan
params.text: Teks pertama untuk smeme (opsional, bisa dikosongkan jika 'text2' diisi)
params.text2: Teks kedua untuk smeme (opsional, bisa dikosongkan jika 'text' diisi)
